problem_text_cn: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线d与它们分别垂直且相交于A,B,C三点,若AB=3,AC=8,则平行线b,c之间的距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c and the straight line d are perpendicular to them and intersect at the three points A, B and C. If AB = N_0 and AC = N_1, the distance between the parallel lines b and c is ( )
